record.title: TMA, ABSTINENCE EDUCATION, AND QI PROGRAMS EXTENSION ACT OF 2007
record.narrative:
TMA, ABSTINENCE EDUCATION, AND QI PROGRAMS EXTENSION ACT OF 2007 -- (Senate - September 27, 2007)

[Page: S12316]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the Senate proceed to the immediate consideration of H.R. 3668, which was received from the House and is at the desk.

record.chair: The clerk will state the bill by title.
The bill clerk read as follows:
A bill (H.R. 3668) to provide for the extension of transitional medical assistance (TMA), the abstinence education program and the qualifying individuals (QI) program.
record.narrative: There being no objection, the Senate proceeded to consider the bill.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the bill be read the third time, passed, the motion to reconsider be laid upon the table; that any statements relating thereto be printed in the Record, without intervening action or debate.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
The bill (H.R. 3668) was ordered to be read a third time, was read the third time, and passed.
